seasons.title: DreamWorks How to Train Your Dragon Legends

episodes.synopsis: Hiccup, Astrid and Gobber rewrite the insider training secrets for 14 dragon species. Then, Gobber and the gang pursue the legendary Boneknapper.
episodes.title: Play All Two: DreamWorks Dragons Short Stories

episodes.synopsis: Hiccup, Astrid and Gobber rewrite the training secrets for 14 different dragon species. Uncover the Island of Berk's legendary dragon mythology!
episodes.title: Book of Dragons

episodes.synopsis: Convinced that the legendary Boneknapper is responsible for burning his house down, Gobber enlists Hiccup and the Viking gang to hunt him down.
episodes.title: Legend of the Boneknapper

video.title: DreamWorks How to Train Your Dragon Legends
video.synopsis: In this set of shorts, Hiccup and the gang learn about different species of dragons. Then, Gobber goes in search of the Boneknapper Dragon.
